<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cavalier's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1921) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 164 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919)

**Requirements**
You are riding your mount.

</column>

---

You [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) to order your mount to Stride twice. At any point during this movement, you can Strike one enemy within reach or within the first range increment of a ranged weapon. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.
name: Cavalier's Charge
